package.description: This software package are header-only definitions of types that are generally useful for robotic systems. It can be installed as either a pure header library (i.e. no build and/or binaries involved), or as an orogen project. In the latter case, the types can then be used in other orogen projects for the component interfaces.
package.author: Sylvain Joyeux/sylvain.joyeux@m4x.org
